QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, okr_key_results.id odf_pk, okr_key_results.RALLY_OBJECT_ID as rally_object_id, okr_key_results.CODE as code, okr_key_results.RALLY_FORMAT_ID as rally_format_id, okr_key_results.START_VALUE as start_value, objective_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, objective_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, okr_key_results.SCHEDULE_TARGET as schedule_target, okr_key_results.SOURCE as source, objective_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, okr_key_results.TARGET_VALUE as target_value, okr_key_results.UNIT_OF_MEASURE as unit_of_measure, OKR_KEY_RESULTS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, okr_key_results.OBJECTIVE_ID as objective_id, okr_key_results.SCHEDULE_START as schedule_start, okr_key_results.OWNER as owner, okr_key_results.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, okr_key_results.INTEGRATION_MAPPINGS as integration_mappings, okr_key_results.LAST_SYNC_MSG as last_sync_msg, okr_key_results.LAST_SYNC_STATUS as last_sync_status, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, okr_key_results.CURRENT_VALUE as current_value, okr_key_results.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, case when (OKR_KEY_RESULTS.TARGET_VALUE - OKR_KEY_RESULTS.START_VALUE) = 0 then null else (OKR_KEY_RESULTS.CURRENT_VALUE - OKR_KEY_RESULTS.START_VALUE)/(1.0*(OKR_KEY_RESULTS.TARGET_VALUE - OKR_KEY_RESULTS.START_VALUE)) end as progress, OKR_KEY_RESULTS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_okr_key_result.partition_code as partition_code, objective_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from okr_key_results okr_key_results JOIN okr_objectives okr_objectives ON okr_objectives.id=okr_key_results.objective_id JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=okr_key_results.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=okr_key_results.last_updated_by JOIN odf_ca_okr_key_result odf_ca_okr_key_result ON odf_ca_okr_key_result.id=okr_key_results.id JOIN (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, okr_objectives.id odf_pk, odf_ca_okr_objective.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_okr_objective.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_okr_objective.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_okr_objective.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from okr_objectives okr_objectives JOIN odf_ca_okr_objective odf_ca_okr_objective ON odf_ca_okr_objective.id=okr_objectives.id where 1 = 1 ) objective_id ON objective_id.odf_pk=okr_key_results.OBJECTIVE_ID where 1 = 1
